reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) KORN 300 or (b) all of KORN 301, KORN 302.
Please contact fultonb@ interchange.ubc.ca if you would like to register in this course. "WAITLISTS: To sign on to the waitlist for this course, please go to http://waitinglist.ubccjk.com/"
Registering for this section does not mean you are enrolled in the course, this is a waitlist section. Students will be moved off the waitlist into the course automatically once there is space. For more information including our department priority guidelines please see: http://www.asia.ubc.ca/undergraduate/department-wait-lists/
courseName: Modern Korean Short Fiction - MOD KORN SHRT FC
description: Reading and translating twentieth-century Korean short fiction.
